column4: can anyone help me format a external hd, gparted doesn't seem to want to..
all partitions must be unmounted. Right click the ones with a lock/key icon and choose unmount
Hm. Do you have windows? If so, try using it to create windows partitions
That's normal if it doesn't have any windows filesystems (fat or ntfs). I'm not good with windows, but I believe the partitioner is under control panel, administrative tools, disk management
